amendment.description: To require the Western Area Power Administration to prepare a report on the use of certain provisions in power contracts.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3843 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3843 proposed by Senator Alexander for Senator McCain to Amendment SA 3801. (consideration: CR S2409-2410; text: CR S2409) To require the Western Area Power Administration to prepare a report on the use of certain provisions in power contracts.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3843 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3843 proposed by Senator Alexander for Senator McCain to Amendment SA 3801.
